dcterms:title: Additional information
rdfs:label: Enter any other information about this person.
dcterms:description: Please add any additional information about the person.

dcterms:title: Identify a person
rdfs:label: Identify a person
dcterms:description: Move and resize the red box until it is over a persons face and press save. Then fill in the two boxes below with the information about the person you have just highlighted.  The other information box can contain information such as Address, Regiment, Rank personal memories or anything else you feel is relevant. If there is more than one person in the photo, you will have the option to add other people on the next page.
